Package net.floodlightcontroller.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Deliverable<T>
    abstracts the 'back side' of a Future that is being listened on, i.e., an object that receives a result or an error of the computaton once it is ready.
    IControllerCompletionListener
    Copyright (c) 2014, NetIDE Consortium (Create-Net (CN), Telefonica Investigacion Y Desarrollo SA (TID), Fujitsu Technology Solutions GmbH (FTS), Thales Communications & Security SAS (THALES), Fundacion Imdea Networks (IMDEA), Universitaet Paderborn (UPB), Intel Research & Innovation Ireland Ltd (IRIIL), Fraunhofer-Institut fur Produktionstechnologie (IPT), Telcaria Ideas SL (TELCA) ) All rights reserved.
    IFloodlightProviderService
    The interface exposed by the core bundle that allows you to interact with connected switches.
    IHAListener
    Listener interface for the HARole of the local controller.
    IInfoProvider  
    IListener<T>  
    IOFConnection
    Contract for an openflow connection to a switch.
    IOFConnectionBackend  
    IOFMessageFilterManagerService  
    IOFMessageListener  
    IOFMessageWriter
    An interface to describe classes that write OF messages.
    IOFSwitch
    An openflow switch connecting to the controller.
    IOFSwitchBackend
    An openflow switch connecting to the controller.
    IOFSwitchDriver  
    IOFSwitchListener
    Switch lifecycle notifications.
    IShutdownListener
    This listener is called when floodlight is about to terminate to enable interested parties to perform final steps, e.g., persisting debug information.
    IShutdownService  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControllerId
    This class represents a unique id of this controller node.
    DeliverableListenableFuture<T>
    Implementation of a ListenableFuture that provides a Deliverable interface to the provider.
    FloodlightContext
    This is a context object where floodlight listeners can register and later retrieve context information associated with an event
    FloodlightContextStore<V>  
    LogicalOFMessageCategory
    Immutable class for logical OF message category.
    Main
    Host for the Floodlight main method
    PortChangeEvent
    Describes a change of an open flow port
    RoleInfo  
    SwitchDescription
    Encapsulates the switch information return from the description stats request
    SwitchDescription.Builder  
    SwitchSyncRepresentation
    Represents a switch in the BigSync store.
    SwitchSyncRepresentation.SyncedPort  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Deliverable.Status  
    HAListenerTypeMarker
    This is a dummy marker.
    HARole
    HARole describes the role that a given controller node currently plays in the management of the SDN network.
    IListener.Command  
    IOFSwitch.SwitchStatus  
    PortChangeType
    the type of change that happened to an open flow port
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SwitchDisconnectedException  
    SwitchDriverSubHandshakeAlreadyStarted
    Thrown when IOFSwitch.startDriverHandshake() is called more than once.
    SwitchDriverSubHandshakeCompleted
    Indicates that a message was passed to a switch driver's subhandshake handling code but the driver has already completed the sub-handshake
    SwitchDriverSubHandshakeException
    Base class for exception thrown by switch driver sub-handshake processing
    SwitchDriverSubHandshakeNotStarted
    Thrown when a switch driver's sub-handshake has not been started but an operation requiring the sub-handshake has been attempted.
    SwitchDriverSubHandshakeStateException
    Thrown when a switch driver's sub-handshake state-machine receives an unexpected OFMessage and/or is in an invald state
